document_data.name: Zigguraxus
document_data.mainbody: '''Zigguraxus''' was the [[Outer Planes|home plane]] of the [[Untheric pantheon]],
document_data.Great Wheel cosmology: From the viewpoint of the [[Great Wheel cosmology]], Zigguraxus was solely the [[divine realm]] of [[Gilgeam]].<ref> It was located on [[Avalas]], the first layer of the [[Great Wheel cosmology#Outer Planes|Outer Plane]] of [[Acheron]].
document_data.History:
When the pantheon was dissolved in [[1358 DR]] after the deaths of Gilgeam and [[Ramman]], the plane disappeared from [[Toril]]'s cosmology.

In [[1487 DR]], the returned [[god]] [[Enlil]] rebuilt the plane for some purpose.
